title: Finding the Baby Jesus: A short story about how recovering a long-lost carving changed a boy's Christmas
description: After being forced to wear lederhosen for the annual holiday card picture, twelve-year-old Chris thinks that the least his parents can do is get him the Tony Hawk skateboard he wants for Christmas. But when a series of unusual events lead to his recovery of the hand-carved Baby Jesus that everyone thought had been destroyed when his Grandma died, Chris realizes that some gifts are even more important than skateboards.
author: Kimball Fisher
